Name: Learning Geography: Countries of the World
About the game: Learn and test your knowledge of 176 countries across the world. There are two separate game modes: Easy mode is a multi-choice where you get a random selection of countries and can learn the proper spelling as well. Hard mode the user must type the full proper name in of the country for it to count. The game features a colorful moving interface with earth showing and marking the countries as you get them blue for right or red for wrong. Good luck making the world blue!
